description:
Benno Rice

COBOL was one of the first business-oriented programming languages, showing up in the 1960s. It’s also regarded as one of the worst languages in which to work. But is that true? And if so, what could ever take its place as the most reviled thing in dev?

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/the-new-cobol

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Sun Aug  4 10:30:00 2019 at Cockle Bay
title: The New COBOL
